document_data.name: ''Ring of Healing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of healing''''' were [[magic items]] which could heal their wearers. They could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The rings were simple bands with a yellow [[gemstone]].
document_data.Powers: A ''ring of healing'' did not heal continuously nor on command. Rather, in battle it would randomly but reliable release a burst of healing and restorative energy that closed wounds and cured ailments.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Raika]], a [[barbarian]] [[adventurer]] active in Waterdeep, wore a ''ring of healing''.
